intro: Drosanthemum brevifolium, commonly known as the narrow-leaved drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit and small, fleshy leaves that are typically green to reddish in color. The plant produces clusters of bright yellow flowers that bloom in spring and summer. It is a member of the Aizoaceae family, known for its succulent properties and ability to thrive in arid conditions. Drosanthemum brevifolium is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and low maintenance requirements.
